description: This file defines a custom Flutter ThemeData named 'Ocean Theme' with specific color schemes, typography, and component styles aimed at creating a minimalist and clean UI aesthetic. It exports a function `buildOceanTheme` to generate theme data based on brightness.

classes.name: _OceanExtraColors
classes.description: A ThemeExtension to add custom color properties (like success color) to the theme.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a customized ThemeData object with a specific color palette, typography, and styling for various UI components.
